pages.title: Change of World
pages.text: At the moment when the first player enters this world, some possibly different energy is brought in and attached to the life in this world.$(br2)We may call these energies supracausal power, or mana.$(br)Mana has a different elemental, and the living can lead these mana to generate magic.

Generally speaking, mana can be divided into different element attributes, some elements are hot, some elements are cold, some elements have the ability to control life, some elements have the ability to control the time of objects, and these divided mana is attached to On creatures in this world. For you who have just entered this world, your mana is still very immature, belonging to the original mana that has not yet been differentiated into elements.
However, we can obtain the mana of different elements through some operations, and develop different functions of these elements.
